```py
numpy.nanmin(a, axis=None, out=None, keepdims=<no value>, initial=<no value>, where=<no value>)
```

```py
>>> a = np.array([[1, 2], [3, np.nan]])
>>> np.nanmin(a)
1.0
>>> np.nanmin(a, axis=0)
array([1.,  2.])
>>> np.nanmin(a, axis=1)
array([1.,  3.]) 
```

```py
>>> np.nanmin([1, 2, np.nan, np.inf])
1.0
>>> np.nanmin([1, 2, np.nan, np.NINF])
-inf 
```
